title: Drawing, "End Table", ca. 1930
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink at lower left: DONALD DESKEY/ 501 MADISON AVENUE/ NEW YORK CITY; small stamp in red ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/ NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower right: Dwg. 210316; lower right in graphite, crossed out: #1616; lower center in graphite: SCALE 1 1/2"=1'0"; lower right in red color pencil: P; dimensions and instructions in graphite throughout.
description: Perspective, elevation and plans for end table. Surface of table has squared edges on upper left and lower right, and rounded edges in upper right and lower left. Legs of table are metal strap on upper left and lower right, and metal tube in upper right and lower left. Sleigh legs on both sides in metal strap.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "End Table", ca. 1930.
ca. 1930. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-1184.
